source.author: os-auto
source.textFileName: The Crow 1994 mHD Bluray DD2.0 x264-TRiM.eng

subtitles:
58644 61939 People once believed
that when someone dies...

62022 65525 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

66443 69821 But sometimes,
something so bad happens...

69905 72407 that a terrible sadness
is carried with it...
72491 74284 and the soul can't rest.
75285 78205 Then sometimes-just sometimes-

78288 82709 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.
106066 107818 I got one here!

137723 142269 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

142352 145939 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

150193 153113 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.
153196 155449 All right, guys, let's do it.

155532 158785 Devil's-fuckin'-Night.
What's the count so far?
160287 162080 They're slacking off from last year.

162164 164958 Three hours to go.
Maybe they're just slow starters.
165042 166626 Corning through!

171006 174343 I really empathize, but you guysjust can't
come in here and take her away like this.
174426 175886 There are procedures to stick by.

175969 178555 You guys should have
cleared this with me first.

179056 181475 - Is this the victim?
- No, it's Amelia Earhart.

181558 183310 We found her, Detective,
and you missed it.

183393 187189 I don't care what her name is.
I didn't give the order to move her.

187272 189900 Jesus, Albrecht. I can see
why they took away your gold shield.

189983 192069 I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.
194571 195864 All right, clear outta here.

197199 199493 - Shelly?
- Stand back, kid.

201995 204956 - Where's Eric?
- Just don't worry about him.
207209 209294 Tell him to take care of Sarah.

209378 212589 Look, I will.
You just lie back. Come on.

222933 225268 - You Sarah?
- Yeah.
225352 229314 Look, your sister-she's gonna be okay.

229398 233735 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.
233819 235237 She's my friend.
235320 237322 Her and Eric.
239699 241493 You lied to her about Eric.
243995 245997 And you're lying to me about Shelly.
247499 249418 She's gonna die, isn't she?
258427 260554 Now, come on. Come on.
261304 262931 Come on. Lt's okay.
266309 267811 She's gonna be fine.

286663 290584 A building gets torched.
All that is left is ashes.

291293 293503 I used to think that was true
about everything-
293587 297507 families, friends, feelings.

298258 302012 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

302095 306516 two people who are meant to be together-
nothing can keep them apart.
344804 346723 What are you, like, the night watchman?

369329 374793 You know, what this place needs
is a good natural catastrophe.
374876 378255 Earthquake, tornado, you know.
378338 379589 No, no, no, no. Mickey.

379673 382634 Come on, man. You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
382717 385011 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
385095 387055 Hey, let me do it.

388223 392269 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

393770 395605 Don't cheap out on me.
Lots of onions.
395689 396773 Here you go.
396856 399234 There you go. All right.
399317 400819 Now we're talkin'.
402028 405031 Hey, it's the Sarah monster.
406575 408243 How do you steer that on a wet street?
408326 410412 Pure talent. Hi.

410495 414416 Sarah, she's a genuine “hot dogger.”
You hungry?

414499 416293 - You buyin'?
- I'm buyin'.
416376 418545 No onions though, okay?
420171 421756 They make you fart big time.

429681 432350 You know, Lake Erie
actually caught on fire once...

432434 435145 from all the crap
floating around in it.
436313 438064 I wish I could have seen that.

545463 547882 - We busted their machines!
- Boom!

570822 574242 Oh, shit, guys.
T-bird, cop car. Cop car.
582083 584085 Bad people out on the street tonight.

590091 592719 - Damn it!
- What was that?

592802 594202 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.
594804 596556 Mickey, call it in for me!
693945 695113 Department of Housing!
695196 697282 Code violations?
697365 699742 Safety hazards?
699826 701995 Place looks fine to me.
702078 704038 Let's redecorate.

708585 714299 “Abashed, the devil stood
and felt how awful goodness is...
714382 717802 saw virtue in her shape how lovely.”
717886 718970 lt's pornography.

789123 792001 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?
793336 795046 Look at that. Look at that.

796422 800927 Here's to Devil's Night,
my new favorite holiday.
801010 802512 To Devil's Night.
804514 806516 You go over there and tell your pals-
807892 809686 You sick fuck.

810687 813481 You're out of your
motherfuckin' mind, man.
819696 821072 Look at that!
822699 824367 Pussies drink last, man.
826202 828204 Fuck you, Tin Tin.
830415 832917 Shit ain't even loaded, man.
833001 834085 This one is.

835211 841050 Which of you Motor City motherfuckers
wants to bet me this one isn't?
842635 846556 Hey! Fire it up! Fire it up!
854147 855940 Here's your shooters.
856024 857775 Put your guns away, huh, guys?
857859 859569 How ya doin', pussycat?
895438 896689 Say that again.
902361 903780 Restaurant.
910411 911829 Wow, you look great.

920671 923257 - Come here!
- No, no, no!
1021272 1023900 Couple more rings. That's 24k.
1026068 1027987 It's crap. Lt's probably fake.
1028070 1030406 Leather purse. Leather.

1033868 1036662 What is this, Tin Tin-
a bloodstain that's on here?

1039749 1042335 L'll give you 50 bucks.
And I hate charities.
1042418 1045254 Now, you take it or leave it.
1046380 1048090 Right there for ya.
1049634 1052178 Decisions, decisions. Yes, right.
1054096 1057266 You cheap-ass, chrome-dome...
1057350 1061312 child-molestin', saprophyte motherfucker.
1061395 1062772 Close the gate when you go out!
1062855 1065483 I closes up for you real good, massa.
1069445 1071614 Yeah, sit on it and twirl, you dirty scum.
1076327 1078913 Lucky I don't stab your fat ass.

1185811 1188230 What the fuck
you all painted up for, crackhead, huh?
1193402 1195571 Halloween ain't till mafiana.
1226227 1228813 L'll kill you! You better go!
1238447 1240574 Fuck you, murderer!

1241283 1244120 I ain't murdered nobody, man!
I don't even fucking know you!
1244203 1245663 What the fuck you want, man?
1245746 1248207 I want you to tell me a story.

1248290 1250501 A man and a woman
in aloft a year ago.

1251627 1254255 - You're out ofyour fucking mind.
- Listen!
1254338 1256549 L'm sure you'll remember.
1256632 1259301 You killed them on Halloween.

1259385 1261387 Yeah. Yeah, right.
Halloween, yeah.

1261470 1264056 Some dude, some bitch.
Whatever, man.
1264140 1265975 Her name was Shelly.
1266767 1269728 You cut her. You raped her.

1270938 1274817 I shanked her pink ass,
and she loved it!
1284910 1286996 Murderer? Murderer?

1287079 1289790 Let me tell you about murder.
It's fun!
1291750 1294503 You gonna learn all about it.
1299341 1301802 I'd like you to meet two buddies of mine.
1303679 1305514 We never miss.
1314565 1316775 Try harder. Try again!
1323741 1326660 Victims. Aren't we all?
1338589 1343928 Sometimes it rains inside my head
1344011 1348474 When the words run dry
1348557 1351769 The walls are breathing

1351852 1354813 Look at this mess!
What's the world comin' to?
1354897 1356190 Yeah, it's a mess.
1361362 1363447 No, they don't have to take you

1363531 1366325 I gotta go upstairs.
Report from the front.
1366408 1370955 No, they don't have to take you away
1371038 1374375 Get out of my way, you worms!
1375918 1377419 Give me some of that over there!

1379672 1383175 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.
1383259 1385010 Hey, guess what.
1385094 1388180 Arcade Games fell down, went boom.
1389473 1392101 Can you imagine that? Lt's tragic.

1392977 1397147 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1397231 1400484 - Is the man in?
- He's taking a meeting.
1430556 1431974 You're thinking about the past.
1437229 1439106 Dad gave me this.
1439189 1441191 Fifth birthday.

1443611 1447281 He said. “Childhood's over
the moment you know you're gonna die.”
1462004 1463505 ls she asleep?
1470846 1472598 I think we broke her.
1478020 1481607 I love her eyes. Pretty.
1485903 1490532 No, they don't have to take you away
1498040 1500876 Hey, kid, get the hell outta the road!
1519061 1520396 Don't fuck with me.
1523899 1526110 I told you to stay out of here.

1526193 1529697 Sol guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1531782 1533784 Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?
1533867 1535244 I don't have any dolls.
1538288 1539623 Get some food, huh?

1539707 1542751 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1548340 1551343 “Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.”
1562104 1565357 Thirty, forty dollars.
1567109 1569528 Who the fuck is this now?
1569611 1573782 Hey! Piss off! We're closed!

1576577 1580456 Go sleep it off somewhere else, dust-head,
unless you want to get mutilated.
1585294 1587546 L'm gonna blow this guy's dick off.

1588505 1591508 Goddamn creatures of the night.
They never learn.

1600809 1605856 “Suddenly I heard a tapping,
as if someone gently rapping...
1605939 1608317 rapping at my chamber door.”
1610360 1612654 What are you talking about?
1612738 1615365 You heard me rapping, right?

1615449 1619620 You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fuckin' new door!

1621997 1625000 L'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

1626335 1628837 You're looking for a coroner,
shit-for-brains.
1633175 1636929 Oh, shit. Oh, shit on me!
1638305 1640849 Shit on me. Shit on me!
1647940 1650234 Mr. Gideon. You're not paying attention.
1658283 1662204 I repeat. A gold engagement ring, yes?

1663664 1667167 It was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1671088 1673423 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.
1678804 1680639 Who's this sack of shit?

1680722 1683851 That's Tin Tin,
one of T-bird's little helpers.
1683934 1686979 I think you can rule out accidental death.

1687062 1689857 Don't any ofyour street demons
have real grown-up names?

1689940 1694111 This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

1694194 1698907 Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.
1698991 1700909 L'm supposed to thank you for that, right?
1700993 1704746 Word to the wise. Watch your fuckin' mouth.
1705956 1708375 What the hell do you call that?
1710377 1712004 I call it blood, Detective.
1712087 1715841 I suppose you'll write it up as graffiti.

1715924 1718719 You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

1726810 1728353 - Warmer?
- What are you doing?

1728437 1731106 - Don't you know this game?
- What game are you talkin' about?
1732024 1734026 Okay, I'll tell you about the rings!

1734109 1737112 They're in that metal box!
It's under the shelf there!
1739197 1741116 Take 'em! Take your fucking rings!

1742367 1744167 And you can choke on them,
you son of a bitch!

1747706 1750292 - Look, it goes up to the attic.
- Okay.
1769061 1771355 It's beautiful. I don't believe it.

1795253 1798173 - You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

1798256 1799675 - Thankyou.
- Take anything!

1802636 1806974 Now you're gonna tell me where to find
the rest of Tin Tin's little party pals.
1807057 1808684 The Pit. They all hang out at the Pit.

1808767 1811228 All of T-bird's little potato-heads
hang out there.
1811311 1814606 Funboy-he lives there upstairs, all right?

1819528 1822114 - A whole jolly club-
- Stop! Please!
1822197 1824366 With jolly pirate nicknames!

1824449 1827077 - Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!

1828787 1834751 Each one of these is a life-
a life you helped destroy.
1834835 1837421 L'm begging you. Don't kill me.
1839214 1841341 L'm not gonna kill you.

1841425 1845429 Yourjob will be to tell the rest of them
that death is coming for them-
1854146 1856898 Tell them Eric Draven sends his regards.

1860235 1864364 You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

1864448 1866175 You're nothing but street grease!
You hear that?
1866199 1868577 Street grease, you motherfucker!
1868660 1870203 Is that gasoline I smell?

1892434 1895270 It's on the house, kiddo.
You know that.
1895979 1898273 One root beer.
1900442 1902986 I can't do anything.
1903070 1907532 Your mom, technically, she's off right now.
1914372 1916416 Police! Don't move!
1916500 1918627 I said, “Don't move!”
1920462 1922339 I thought the police always said “Freeze!”

1922422 1924758 lam the police
and I say don't move, Snow White.
1924841 1926343 You move, you're dead.
1927969 1931640 And I say I'm dead and I move.
1932516 1934976 Not one more step. I'm serious.
1935060 1939397 Then shoot, if you will, Officer Albrecht.

1939481 1942609 What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

1944486 1947697 - You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

1947781 1951743 How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?
1951827 1954538 Shelly Webster's dead, my friend.

1954621 1958083 I want you to move over to the curb.
Real nice and easy.
1962254 1963922 We're gonna wait here for backup.
1964005 1966007 It's gettin' too friggin' weird for me.
1967425 1968593 Oh, it gets better.
1968677 1971179 D0 you know someone named T-bird?

1971263 1974474 He had a friend who shouldn't have
played with knives.
1974558 1975767 Like the coat?

1975851 1979104 - You're the guy that murdered Tin Tin.
- Hey, check it out!
1980564 1982023 He was already dead.

1982983 1985694 He died a year ago-
the moment he touched her.

1988196 1991199 They're all dead.
Theyjust don't know it yet.
1992534 1993702 Get away from there!
1993785 1996454 Cops! Get outta here!
1998206 2000208 Leave it! Leave it! Run!
2005755 2008842 Oh, great. Great.

2010135 2012846 Guy shows up looking like
a mime from hell...

2012929 2015307 and you lose him
right out in the open.

2015390 2020270 Well, at least he didn't do that
“walking against the wind” shit.

2020353 2022647 - I hate that.
- Little early for Devil's Night.
2023732 2025066 What the hell is going on there?
2026651 2029487 You are very restless.

2029571 2032657 Just wish I was a little hungry again.
That's all.
2032741 2034409 Be careful of what you ask for.
2034492 2036369 Yeah, you may get it. I know.
2048381 2051468 There are energies aligning against you.
2051551 2054012 Seeing is believing, isn't it?

2073198 2077077 Gideon's pawnshopjust burned down
to the foundation.
2077160 2079621 Nobody cleared this little event with me.
2079704 2082290 I didn't have nothing to do with that.

2082374 2085001 - L'm sure you must be awful disappointed.
- I got trouble.
2085085 2088421 One of my crew got himself perished.

2088505 2090799 - Who might that be?
- Tin Tin.

2090882 2095428 Somebody stuck his blades in all
his major organs in alphabetical order.

2095512 2098848 Gentlemen, I think we ought to have
an introspective moment of silence...
2098932 2101351 for poor old Tin Tin.

2104312 2106564 You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

2106648 2109442 - Whatever you say. I can do.
- Good.
2109526 2111611 That's very reassuring.

2111695 2115282 I still ain't heard the story
on why Gideon's burned down.

2116491 2120996 Is that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?
2121830 2123707 Call it my need to know.
2155655 2157824 Hey! Let me go!, you creep!

2164247 2167542 You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!

2170003 2172339 - He couldn't have stopped.
- He was a butt-face.
2172422 2174049 I could have made it.

2175967 2178053 What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?
2183058 2185185 It's more like surfing than skating.
2185268 2187729 I wish the rain would stop, just once.
2188897 2190357 It can't rain all the time.

2209376 2213963 Don't thank me.
Are we fighting the good fight?
2214047 2216508 Double homicide a year ago.
2216591 2218426 No convictions.
2218510 2221930 Annie, look at that.

2222931 2227268 “We, the undersigned tenants
of 1929 Caulderon Court Apartments”-
2227352 2228853 What is this, a petition?

2228937 2231332 A big “kick me” sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.
2231356 2232857 The cause got her killed.

2232941 2235443 She was fighting tenant eviction
in that neighborhood?

2235527 2241408 Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

2241491 2245036 The last time you snooping on a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

2245120 2249124 - I know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- I bet he does.

2257090 2259843 You're gonna wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2262137 2266266 You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.
2267934 2269436 I owe you one.
2299215 2302927 Tomorrow night we can get high...

2303011 2306639 and watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.
2332165 2334375 There's a big fuckin' bird over there.

2341716 2345303 Come here, bird.
Hey, bird. Hey, bird.
2347805 2350391 Here, birdie, birdie.
2350475 2353436 Come here, birdie, birdie, birdie.
2364280 2366241 What the fuck?

2372664 2377085 Man, don't do that!
You nearly gave me a fucking heart attack!
2377168 2379420 Look at the guy.
2379504 2381089 Don't sweat it.

2384050 2387095 It's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

2395979 2399816 Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

2401859 2406781 You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?
2406864 2410410 You need professional help.
2414747 2417458 He shoots! He scores!
2427594 2430263 Jesus Christ!

2430346 2434100 Jesus Christ?
Stop me if you heard this one.
2434183 2436436 Jesus Christ walks into a hotel.

2442525 2445320 He hands the innkeeper
three nails, and he asks-
2446529 2448906 Don't you ever fuckin' die?
2448990 2450825 “Can you put me up for the night?”

2456748 2461336 - Does that hurt?
- Fuck, yes, it fuckin' hurts!
2464255 2467634 Look what you've done to my sheets.
2491866 2493868 I've got a gun in my pocket.
2496704 2499582 You're happy to see me, aren't you?
2517392 2521229 Stay away! Stay away from me!

2532907 2537453 “Mother” is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.

2537537 2542291 D0 you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

2553928 2557515 Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

2589547 2593301 If I wanted ice, I would have
asked for ice! Now fill it up!
2595720 2597764 Fill it up yourself, macho man.
2597847 2599515 I really need this.
2611027 2613029 You burn yourself playing with matches?

2613112 2615698 - Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

2615782 2618242 - Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

2618326 2621245 This is a first.
Do I bow or do I curtsy?
2621329 2624165 Get my friend here a glass of blood.

2625958 2629170 - Hey, hon!
- Good night, Darla.
2633049 2636719 You stay put right there.
2646103 2648314 Get away, steam-head.

2680805 2684350 You can see I'm here on the corner
of 27th Street and East Washington Place...

2684433 2687728 the site of last year's
biggest Devil's Night conflagration.

2687812 2690012 It was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

2690064 2693693 across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

2693776 2696404 The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...
2696487 2698531 and cost the lives of two firefighters.

2699240 2703494 In fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police precinct-
2706205 2708624 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.
2714839 2716090 Good likeness.

2716173 2719886 I saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.
2721053 2722221 You still have your hat on.
2726100 2728227 I gotta sit down.
2738070 2742325 are you some kind of... ghost?
2751959 2753878 I don't know what I am.
2753961 2756505 I need you to tell me what happened to us.

2758591 2762595 You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.
2762678 2765765 She was beaten and raped.

2765848 2770436 Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.
2770519 2772939 Come on. Read the file.

2773022 2777568 Shelly Webster held on for 30 hours
in intensive care.
2777652 2780696 Her body finallyjust gave it up.
2780780 2783658 I saw it. I couldn't dojack for her.

2795211 2796629 - Hey.
- Don't touch me!
2809350 2812520 I saw her through your eyes.
2812603 2814772 You stayed with her the whole time.

2814855 2819026 Well, you gotta understand
something, all right?

2820361 2825116 I was hoping she'd come out of it,
you know...
2825199 2828119 give me something I could work with.
2832999 2835501 Why didn't you do something about it?

2835584 2838939 You think any of those people in that building-
even the ones who signed the petition-
2838963 2840715 would talk after what happened to you?
2842508 2844677 I kept asking questions...

2845886 2848526 and finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.
2852560 2854437 This your wife?

2854520 2859066 Yeah, we-Well, not anymore.
We're getting a divorce.

2863863 2867575 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

2867658 2869994 I used to think
they were kind of trivial.
2870077 2873372 Believe me, nothing is trivial.

2884050 2888637 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2893726 2896562 Are you gonna vanish
into thin air again?
2900608 2902902 I thought I'd use your front door.

2908991 2911786 I'm sorry as hell for what happened
to you and your girlfriend.

2923798 2926717 I got stabbed!
I shot the son of a bitch!

2926801 2929553 I watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

2929637 2932723 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2932807 2935810 - Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.
2935893 2938604 I saw him too. He had a guitar.

2938687 2943109 He winked at me before hejumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.
2943192 2946862 He winked at ya? Musicians.
2948322 2949824 What else did you see?

2949907 2952867 So far I haven't heard shit about what
you're gonna do about all this crap!

2952910 2957706 What do I get? My livelihood
got flushed away and went swirling.
2960000 2961752 You ain't lost everything.

2961836 2966966 Yeah? And maybe you're not
such a big shot eithefljesus!
2967842 2970636 Fair enough. Catch.

2974223 2976642 Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.
2976725 2978561 Are you tellin' me this thing is real?

2978644 2982314 All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.

2982398 2986485 Sometimes they're more useful
than the people who bear them.

2986569 2990698 You're directly out ofyour fucking mind!
You know that?
2992700 2995619 Yeah. Eyes see.

2995703 2998664 It's one of the most important things
I learned from my sister.
2998747 3000387 Sister? She's supposed to be your sister?
3002084 3005421 My father's daughter. That's right.

3005504 3007424 What's the matter,
you don't see the resemblance?
3009008 3011010 Now, let's take it from the top, friend.
3011093 3014513 With a lot of detail. What do you say?

3014597 3018142 He had a bird with him.
Nearly pecked my face off.

3018225 3021645 He told me to tell T-bird
that death was on its way.
3021729 3023939 Whatever the fuck that means.
3024857 3027776 Draven. He said his name was Eric Draven.
3028861 3030946 You wanna relax that thing now?

3031030 3035701 This bird man, hejust happened
to let you live, huh?

3035784 3039997 You sure you ain't making all this up
just to save your own ass?
3040080 3042875 I ain't makin' all this up.
3042958 3046128 I ain't twisted like you two fucks.
3055971 3057598 A boy and his bird.
3059141 3061101 Awful touching.

3071362 3074323 For fuck's sake, die, will ya?
Give me that thing.
3083666 3085960 Funboy said he saw a black bird too.

3088504 3090839 Then he choked to death
on his own blood.
3092508 3095261 L'll have thejanitor come on up.
3159825 3164038 You again. Are you lost or hungry?
3169251 3171170 It can't rain all the time
3171253 3173255 Can't rain all the time

3184892 3187662 I mean, how many times I gotta tell you?
We're in this together, or we ain't!
3187686 3189688 If one part falls, it all falls!

3499706 3502709 There ain't no coming back!

3515847 3518850 “And felt how awful goodness is.”

3585792 3588086 This is the 7:00 am.
Edit/on of Action News.

3588170 3590547 For over a decade,
the night before Halloween...

3590630 3594926 has had a darker and deadlier nickname
in the inner city-“Devil's Night”...

3595010 3598472 the name given to what has become
an annual plague of arson.

3598555 3603894 Last year, 200 individual blazes were
reported, and 11 people lost their lives.

3603977 3609107 Tonight, we'II be keying on what may become
the biggest and deadliest Devil's Night ever.

3609191 3612819 The mayor has firefighters
from all surrounding counties-

3612903 3616698 Do you like them up or over?

3618742 3621453 What are you doing?

3621536 3624331 Wait, you loved eggs.
3624998 3626958 Yeah, when I was five.

3627042 3630670 So what do you want now?
Black coffee and cigarettes?

3630754 3634132 So what did you take
to become mother of the year?

3635050 3639262 It wasn't drugs.

3646144 3650398 You're acting weird. Did you win

3661868 3665747 I like 'em over easy, Morn.

3724139 3727100 who winds up in T-bird's car

3940313 3943191 Gets so lonely all by myself.

3950824 3953493 Sarah, I do care.

3973138 3975640 Then he took him away.

3975723 3978560 And he flash-fried T-bird

3979352 3982105 T-bird! Here's to you, buddy.

4017599 4020351 This ghost gonna kill my ass next.

4148896 4153192 Down avenues, cut me

4193900 4196944 on account of a slight case of death.

4206537 4208498 I thought we'd throw a little party...

4208581 4211876 start a bunch of fires,

4211959 4214128 I like the pretty lights.

4221094 4222720 That's no reason to quit.
4222804 4226307 Wrong. Best reason to quit.
4226391 4228768 Only reason to quit.

4239445 4244784 The idea expands.

4254293 4256796 it'd put a big old smile on my face.
4258339 4260383 You see, gentlemen...
4260466 4263594 greed is for amateurs.
4265179 4270226 Disorder, chaos, anarchy-

4285241 4288327 Devil's Night greeting cards.

4317315 4319942 “Are we having fun or what?”
